verses.verse: בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> At that time הַהִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD [וְיֹצִיאוּ כ] (יֹוצִ֣יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> after ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמ֣וֹת <S%H6106><s%> the bones מַלְכֵֽי־ <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יְהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמוֹת־ <S%H6106><s%> and the bones שָׂרָיו֩ <S%H8269><s%> of his princes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמ֨וֹת <S%H6106><s%> and the bones הַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> עַצְמ֣וֹת <S%H6106><s%> and the bones הַנְּבִיאִ֗ים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> עַצְמ֥וֹת <S%H6106><s%> and the bones יוֹשְׁבֵֽי־ <S%H3427><s%> of the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem מִקִּבְרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6913><s%> out of their graves

וּשְׁטָחוּם֩ <S%H7849><s%> And they shall spread לַשֶּׁ֨מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> them before the sun וְלַיָּרֵ֜חַ <S%H3394><s%> and the moon וּלְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> all צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> and all the host הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אֲהֵב֜וּם <S%H157><s%> whom they have loved וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> and which עֲבָדוּם֙ <S%H5647><s%> and whom they have served וַֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> and which הָלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> whom they have walked אַֽחֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H310><s%> and after וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> and which דְּרָשׁ֔וּם <S%H1875><s%> and whom they have sought וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and which הִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <S%H7812><s%> and whom they have worshipped לָהֶ֑ם לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> they shall not be gathered וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יִקָּבֵ֔רוּ <S%H6912><s%> nor be buried לְדֹ֛מֶן <S%H1828><s%> they shall be for dung עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon the face הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth יִֽהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וְנִבְחַ֥ר <S%H977><s%> shall be chosen מָ֙וֶת֙ <S%H4194><s%> And death מֵֽחַיִּ֔ים <S%H2416><s%> rather than life לְכֹ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> all הַשְּׁאֵרִית֙ <S%H7611><s%> by all the residue הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֔ים <S%H7604><s%> of them that remain מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> rather הַמִּשְׁפָּחָ֥ה <S%H4940><s%> family הָֽרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> of this evil הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> in בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמְּקֹמ֤וֹת <S%H4725><s%> in all the places הַנִּשְׁאָרִים֙ <S%H7604><s%> which remain אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> to which הִדַּחְתִּ֣ים <S%H5080><s%> whither I have driven שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> them נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> them saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts ס

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> Moreover thou shalt say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הֲיִפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> Shall they fall וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not יָק֑וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> and not arise אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> ? shall he turn away וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> and not return

מַדּ֨וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why שׁוֹבְבָ֜ה <S%H7725><s%> slidden back הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> Why [then] is this people הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> has this יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem מְשֻׁבָ֣ה <S%H4878><s%> backsliding נִצַּ֑חַת <S%H5331><s%> alway הֶחֱזִ֙יקוּ֙ <S%H2388><s%> fast בַּתַּרְמִ֔ית <S%H8649><s%> fast deceit מֵאֲנ֖וּ <S%H3985><s%> they refuse לָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> to return

הִקְשַׁ֤בְתִּי <S%H7181><s%> I hearkened וָֽאֶשְׁמָע֙ <S%H8085><s%> and heard לוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not כֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <S%H1696><s%> [but] they spake not aright אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> No אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> no man נִחָם֙ <S%H5162><s%> repented עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> him of רָ֣עָת֔וֹ <S%H7451><s%> his wickedness לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saying מֶ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What עָשִׂ֑יתִי <S%H6213><s%> What have I done כֻּלֹּ֗ה <S%H3605><s%> all manner שָׁ֚ב <S%H7725><s%> ? every one turned [בִּמְרֻצֹותָם כ] (בִּמְר֣וּצָתָ֔ם <S%H4794><s%> course ק) כְּס֥וּס <S%H5483><s%> as the horse שׁוֹטֵ֖ף <S%H7857><s%> rusheth בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> into the battle

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even חֲסִידָ֣ה <S%H2624><s%> Yea the stork בַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> in the heaven יָֽדְעָה֙ <S%H3045><s%> knoweth מֽוֹעֲדֶ֔יהָ <S%H4150><s%> her appointed times וְתֹ֤ר <S%H8449><s%> and the turtle [וְסוּס כ] (וְסִיס֙ <S%H5483><s%> crane ק) וְעָג֔וּר <S%H5693><s%> and the swallow שָׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> observe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> the time בֹּאָ֑נָה <S%H935><s%> of their coming וְעַמִּ֕י <S%H5971><s%> but my people לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָֽדְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> know אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> not the judgment יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

אֵיכָ֤ה <S%H349><s%> how תֹֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> How do ye say חֲכָמִ֣ים <S%H2450><s%> We [are] wise אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we וְתוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> and the law יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אִתָּ֑נוּ <S%H854><s%> for אָכֵן֙ <S%H403><s%> [is] with us? Lo certainly הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold לַשֶּׁ֣קֶר <S%H8267><s%> in vain עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> made עֵ֖ט <S%H5842><s%> he [it] the pen שֶׁ֥קֶר <S%H8267><s%> [is] in vain סֹפְרִֽים׃ <S%H5608><s%> of the scribes

הֹבִ֣ישׁוּ <S%H954><s%> are put חֲכָמִ֔ים <S%H2450><s%> The wise חַ֖תּוּ <S%H2865><s%> they are dismayed וַיִּלָּכֵ֑דוּ <S%H3920><s%> and taken הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold בִדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מָאָ֔סוּ <S%H3988><s%> lo they have rejected וְחָכְמַֽת־ <S%H2451><s%> and what wisdom מֶ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> and what לָהֶֽם׃ ס

לָכֵן֩ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore אֶתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> Therefore will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְשֵׁיהֶ֜ם <S%H802><s%> their wives לַאֲחֵרִ֗ים <S%H312><s%> unto others שְׂדֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H7704><s%> [and] their fields לְי֣וֹרְשִׁ֔ים <S%H3423><s%> to them that shall inherit כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because מִקָּטֹן֙ <S%H6996><s%> [them] for every one from the least וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> even unto the greatest כֻּלֹּ֖ה <S%H3605><s%> Everyone בֹּצֵ֣עַ <S%H1214><s%> is given בָּ֑צַע <S%H1215><s%> to covetousness מִנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> from the prophet וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even כֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> even unto the priest כֻּלֹּ֖ה <S%H3605><s%> Everyone עֹ֥שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> every one dealeth שָּֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> falsely

וַיְרַפּ֞וּ <S%H7495><s%> For they have healed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֤בֶר <S%H7667><s%> the hurt בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> of my people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נְקַלָּ֔ה <S%H7043><s%> slightly לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saying שָׁל֣וֹם ׀ <S%H7965><s%> Peace שָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace וְאֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> is no שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> when [there is] no peace

הֹבִ֕שׁוּ <S%H3001><s%> Were they ashamed כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because תוֹעֵבָ֖ה <S%H8441><s%> of the abomination עָשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> when they had committed גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> were they בּ֣וֹשׁ <S%H954><s%> ashamed לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> were not יֵבֹ֗שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ashamed וְהִכָּלֵם֙ <S%H3637><s%> they blush לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדָ֔עוּ <S%H3045><s%> neither could לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יִפְּל֣וּ <S%H5307><s%> therefore shall they fall בַנֹּפְלִ֗ים <S%H5307><s%> among them that fall בְּעֵ֧ת <S%H6256><s%> in the time פְּקֻדָּתָ֛ם <S%H6486><s%> of their visitation יִכָּשְׁל֖וּ <S%H3782><s%> they shall be cast down אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

אָסֹ֥ף <S%H622><s%> I will surely אֲסִיפֵ֖ם <S%H5486><s%> consume נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> them saith יְהֹוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֵין֩ <S%H369><s%> There עֲנָבִ֨ים <S%H6025><s%> [there shall be] no grapes בַּגֶּ֜פֶן <S%H1612><s%> on the vine וְאֵ֧ין <S%H369><s%> will be no תְּאֵנִ֣ים <S%H8384><s%> nor figs בַּתְּאֵנָ֗ה <S%H8384><s%> on the fig tree וְהֶֽעָלֶה֙ <S%H5929><s%> and the leaf נָבֵ֔ל <S%H5034><s%> shall fade וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and [the things that] I have given לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> them יַעַבְרֽוּם׃ <S%H5674><s%> them shall pass away

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מָה֙ <S%H4100><s%> how long אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we יֹֽשְׁבִ֔ים <S%H3427><s%> Why do we sit still הֵֽאָסְפ֗וּ <S%H622><s%> ? assemble וְנָב֛וֹא <S%H935><s%> yourselves and let us enter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> cities הַמִּבְצָ֖ר <S%H4013><s%> into the defenced וְנִדְּמָה־ <S%H1826><s%> and let us be silent שָּׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> Because יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> there for the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God הֲדִמָּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H1826><s%> hath put us to silence וַיַּשְׁקֵ֣נוּ <S%H8248><s%> to drink מֵי־ <S%H4325><s%> and given us water רֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7219><s%> of gall כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because חָטָ֖אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> because we have sinned לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD

קַוֵּ֥ה <S%H6960><s%> We looked לְשָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> for peace וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> no ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> but no good לְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> [came and] for a time מַרְפֵּ֖ה <S%H4832><s%> of health וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold בְעָתָֽה׃ <S%H1205><s%> and behold trouble

מִדָּ֤ן <S%H1835><s%> from Dan נִשְׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> was heard נַחְרַ֣ת <S%H5170><s%> The snorting סוּסָ֗יו <S%H5483><s%> of his horses מִקּוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> at the sound מִצְהֲל֣וֹת <S%H4684><s%> of the neighing אַבִּירָ֔יו <S%H47><s%> of his strong ones רָעֲשָׁ֖ה <S%H7493><s%> trembled כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the whole land וַיָּב֗וֹאוּ <S%H935><s%> for they are come וַיֹּֽאכְלוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> and have devoured אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וּמְלוֹאָ֔הּ <S%H4393><s%> and all עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> that is in it the city וְיֹ֥שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> and those that dwell בָֽהּ׃ ס

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold מְשַׁלֵּ֜חַ <S%H7971><s%> For behold I will send בָּכֶ֗ם נְחָשִׁים֙ <S%H5175><s%> serpents צִפְעֹנִ֔ים <S%H6848><s%> cockatrices אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> there לָהֶ֖ם לָ֑חַשׁ <S%H3908><s%> among you which [will] not [be] charmed וְנִשְּׁכ֥וּ <S%H5391><s%> and they shall bite אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> you saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

מַבְלִ֥יגִיתִ֖י <S%H4010><s%> [When] I would comfort עֲלֵ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and יָג֑וֹן <S%H3015><s%> myself against sorrow עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> and לִבִּ֥י <S%H3820><s%> my heart דַוָּֽי׃ <S%H1742><s%> [is] faint

הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold ק֞וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Behold the voice שַֽׁוְעַ֣ת <S%H7775><s%> of the cry בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter עַמִּ֗י <S%H5971><s%> of my people מֵאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> country מַרְחַקִּ֔ים <S%H4801><s%> because of them that dwell in a far הַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [Is] not the LORD אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else בְּצִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo מַלְכָּ֖הּ <S%H4428><s%> king אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else בָּ֑הּ מַדּ֗וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why הִכְעִס֛וּנִי <S%H3707><s%> in her?
